article.headline: Bailey has 17, Wofford downs Mercer 73-60
article.description: — Dillon Bailey's 17 points helped Wofford defeat Mercer 73-60 on Wednesday night.

images.name: Wofford Terriers vs. Mercer Bears: Game Highlights
images.caption: Wofford Terriers vs. Mercer Bears: Game Highlights

video.headline: Wofford Terriers vs. Mercer Bears: Game Highlights
video.caption: Wofford Terriers vs. Mercer Bears: Game Highlights
video.title: Wofford Terriers vs. Mercer Bears: Game Highlights
video.description: Wofford Terriers vs. Mercer Bears: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Wofford Terriers vs. Mercer Bears: Game Highlights) 2024/02/15 ESHEET

article.story: MACON, Ga. -- — Dillon Bailey's 17 points helped Wofford defeat Mercer 73-60 on Wednesday night. Bailey shot 5 for 9 (3 for 7 from 3-point range) and 4 of 5 from the free throw line for the Terriers (15-11, 8-5 Southern Conference). Jackson Sivills scored 16 points while shooting 6 for 7, including 2 for 3 from beyond the arc, and added seven rebounds. Anthony Arrington, Jr. had 11 points and shot 4 for 8, including 3 for 6 from beyond the arc. Jake Davis finished with 15 points for the Bears (11-15, 4-9). Alex Holt and David Thomas each recorded 12 points. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
